sentences.en: Capitalist economy development is lopsided still be basic rule.
sentences.cn: 资本主义经济发展不平衡仍是基本规律.

sentences.en: He fixed me with a lopsided grin.
His hipbones jutted out in lopsided triangles.
sentences.cn: 它的髋骨向一侧突出,成三角形.

sentences.en: His suit had shoulders that made him look lopsided.
sentences.cn: 他那套西服的两肩不平，让他整个人看起来一边高一边低。

sentences.en: Now, the mainest problem is the job development is lopsided.
sentences.cn: 现在, 最主要的问题是工作发展不平衡.

sentences.en: The article presents a somewhat lopsided view of events.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章对事情的看法显得有些片面。

sentences.en: The current recognition of the concept of acupoint is lopsided.
sentences.cn: 现今对腧穴概念的理解是不全面的.

sentences.en: The lopsided current situation of globalization makes much polarization process presents labyrinthian sex and complexity.
sentences.cn: 全球化的不平衡现状使多极化进程呈现曲折性和复杂性.

sentences.en: The lopsided global developping appalling present in China.
sentences.cn: 全球性的发展不均衡在中国体现得如此触目惊心.

sentences.en: The lopsided load on the lorry looked dangerous.
sentences.cn: 货车上倾斜的货物,看样子很危险.

sentences.en: The occurrence of that type of lopsided economic development has been checked.
sentences.cn: 这种经济畸形发展的现象被纠正了.

sentences.en: The prevailing exchange rate system is lopsided.
sentences.cn: 世界现行汇率体系已经失衡.

sentences.en: We won a game by a lopsided score of 14 to 2.
sentences.cn: 我们以14比2的悬殊比分赢了一局.

sentences.en: We won by a lopsided score.
sentences.cn: 我们以遥遥领先的比分获胜.

words.tran_cn: 不匀称；不平衡；倾向一方

trans.tran_cn: 不平等的，两侧不匀称[不平衡]的，向一侧歪斜的，畸
trans.tran_en: unequal or uneven, especially in an unfair way
